attributes.action: We, the nation, on behalf of the late Winnie Johnson, respectfully request the help needed in finding Keith Bennett.
attributes.additional_details: Due to the passing of Winnie Johnson, the nation shall now be her voice, in asking for the resources needed to find her son Keith Bennett, the only one of the Moors Murders victims left unfound, so he can be laid to rest by her side and enable this tragic period in our history to have closure.
